name: Risesmart - Ranstad

features: Get on-demand data and analytics reporting
Headline: We help drive intentional and inclusive talent
ShortDescription: Randstad RiseSmart - part of Randstad Enterprise, is a leading specialist in worklife coaching and career transitions and an operating company of Randstad N.V.
enhanced_description: Randstad RiseSmart, an operating company of Randstad N.V. and part of Randstad Enterprise, is a leading specialist in worklife coaching and career transitions. Utilizing a coaching-centric approach, the service is designed to support individuals throughout all stages of their employment lifecycle, including onboarding, development, mobilization, engagement, retention, and transition. The core purpose is to enable organizations to unleash possibilities for their people by aligning their worklife experience with business needs. Key offerings include redeployment services and on-demand data and analytics reporting, which contribute to retaining institutional knowledge and driving intentional and inclusive talent strategies, ultimately aiming to improve employee happiness and engagement and fill open positions more quickly.
key_use_cases: Preserving institutional knowledge during employee transitions
Accelerating talent acquisition and filling open positions
competitive_advantages: Specialization as a leading provider in worklife coaching and career transitions
Comprehensive support across the entire employee lifecycle (onboarding, development, mobilization, engagement, retention, transition)
Capability to help retain institutional knowledge
Availability of on-demand data and analytics reporting for informed decision-making
Focus on driving intentional and inclusive talent
roi_benefits: Business growth stemming from thriving employees
primary_users: Employees (as beneficiaries of coaching and transition services)
